name: Bypass
description:
Bypass is a hacking themed stealth board game where you unleash computer viruses to obtain critical data, or obliterate your opponent’s malicious software. Traverse through a network of nodes to avoid detection, control those nodes to gain the upper hand, and deploy tools to obstruct and outsmart your opponent. Hack your way to victory, or shut down the hacker in Bypass.

Credit goes to:

Braydon Hanson

Tucker Ramhorst

Shelby Heronimus

Tim Kuter
